languages.text: {n}Вы слышите шорох за спиной — дознаватель склоняется в церемонном поклоне. В ту же секунду глаза многих ваших подданных вспыхивают фанатичным огнем — всего один скромный жест одного скромного служителя {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g} служит для них лучшим доказательством того, что вы воистину являетесь дланью {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} в этом темном секторе.{/n}

{n}You hear a rustle behind you as Heinrix leans forward in a ceremonious bow. In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы слышите шорох за спиной — дознаватель склоняется в церемонном поклоне. В ту же секунду глаза многих ваших подданных вспыхивают фанатичным огнем — всего один скромный жест одного скромного служителя {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g} служит для них лучшим доказательством того, что вы воистину являетесь дланью {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} в этом темном секторе.{/n}

In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}

languages.text: {n}スッという音があなたの後から聞こえたかと思えば、ハインリックスが前屈みになって儀礼的に一礼する。その瞬間、臣下の大勢の瞳には狂信の火が燃え上がる。控えめな{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の従者が見せた、この控えめな動作ひとつが、あなたの臣下に対する究極の証明として働く。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の手はこの暗い星域でも正しく機能していると。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a rustle behind you as Heinrix leans forward in a ceremonious bow. In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スッという音があなたの後から聞こえたかと思えば、ハインリックスが前屈みになって儀礼的に一礼する。その瞬間、臣下の大勢の瞳には狂信の火が燃え上がる。控えめな{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の従者が見せた、この控えめな動作ひとつが、あなたの臣下に対する究極の証明として働く。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の手はこの暗い星域でも正しく機能していると。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听到身后传来一阵布料摩擦的沙沙声，海因里希朝你走了过来，恭敬地鞠了一躬。目睹了这一幕，台下无数臣民的眼睛里都闪烁着狂喜的光芒。这位来自{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的谦逊仆人，仅仅以一个表示谦恭的简单动作，便让所有人深信不疑——{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}依然眷顾这片黑暗的疆域。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a rustle behind you as Heinrix leans forward in a ceremonious bow. In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到身后传来一阵布料摩擦的沙沙声，海因里希朝你走了过来，恭敬地鞠了一躬。目睹了这一幕，台下无数臣民的眼睛里都闪烁着狂喜的光芒。这位来自{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的谦逊仆人，仅仅以一个表示谦恭的简单动作，便让所有人深信不疑——{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}依然眷顾这片黑暗的疆域。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oyes un crepitar detrás de ti. Es Heinrix, haciendo una reverencia ceremoniosa. En este momento los ojos de tus súbditos brillan con fanatismo. Este sencillo gesto de un modesto sirviente de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} representa para ellos la prueba definitiva de que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} verdaderamente obra para salvar este siniestro sector.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a rustle behind you as Heinrix leans forward in a ceremonious bow. In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes un crepitar detrás de ti. Es Heinrix, haciendo una reverencia ceremoniosa. En este momento los ojos de tus súbditos brillan con fanatismo. Este sencillo gesto de un modesto sirviente de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g} representa para ellos la prueba definitiva de que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} verdaderamente obra para salvar este siniestro sector.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un bruissement et voyez du coin de l'œil Heinrix s'incliner cérémonieusement. Pour la foule surexcitée, ce geste sans prétention offert par un modeste serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} est la preuve suprême que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} n'a pas abandonné ce secteur. L'exultation générale se transforme alors en ferveur proche du fanatisme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a rustle behind you as Heinrix leans forward in a ceremonious bow. In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez un bruissement et voyez du coin de l'œil Heinrix s'incliner cérémonieusement. Pour la foule surexcitée, ce geste sans prétention offert par un modeste serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} est la preuve suprême que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} n'a pas abandonné ce secteur. L'exultation générale se transforme alors en ferveur proche du fanatisme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hörst hinter dir ein Rascheln, als Heinrix sich zeremoniell nach vorne beugt. In diesem Moment blitzt in den Augen deiner zahlreichen Untertanen Fanatismus auf – diese kleine Geste eines unscheinbaren Dieners der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} ist für sie der unumstößliche Beweis, dass die Hand des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} in diesem dunklen Sektor tatsächlich wirkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a rustle behind you as Heinrix leans forward in a ceremonious bow. In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst hinter dir ein Rascheln, als Heinrix sich zeremoniell nach vorne beugt. In diesem Moment blitzt in den Augen deiner zahlreichen Untertanen Fanatismus auf – diese kleine Geste eines unscheinbaren Dieners der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} ist für sie der unumstößliche Beweis, dass die Hand des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} in diesem dunklen Sektor tatsächlich wirkt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arkandaki hışırtıyı duyup dönünce Heinrix'in merasime uygun şekilde reverans yaptığını görüyorsun. O anda kullarından birçoğunun gözleri, fanatizmle parlıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon'un{/g} mütevazı bir hizmetkârının gerçekleştirdiği bu mütevazı davranış, onlar için {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} elinin bu karanlık sektörlere kadar uzandığının nihai kanıtı oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a rustle behind you as Heinrix leans forward in a ceremonious bow. In that moment, the eyes of your many subjects flare with fanaticism — this single unassuming gesture from an unassuming servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} serves to them as the ultimate proof that the hand of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} truly is at work in this dark sector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arkandaki hışırtıyı duyup dönünce Heinrix merasime uygun bir reverans yaptığını görüyorsun. O anda kullarından birçoğunun gözü fanatizmle parlıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g}'un mütevazı bir hizmetkârının gerçekleştirdiği bu mütevazı davranış, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un elinin bu karanlık sektörlere kadar uzandığının nihai kanıtı oluyor kendilerine.{/n}
